Description: Water carrying pottery vessel of eliptical shape.
Curator's comments: Register: "Used for carrying water. Oasis of Dakhla, south-west desert, Egypt. Carried under arm."
Acquisition name: Donated by: J E M Mellor
Acquisition notes: Af1930,1105.1 to 20 were given by J E M Mellor, who had collected them in Egypt. The registers records his notes on the find spots and usage of the objects.
